00023 #ifndef __NITF_DLL_H__
00024 #define __NITF_DLL_H__
00025 
00026 
00027 #include "nitf/Defines.h"
00028 #include "nitf/Types.h"
00029 #include "nitf/Memory.h"
00030 #include "nitf/Error.h"
00031 
00032 
00033 
00034 #ifdef WIN32
00035 /*  Under windows, a dynamic shared object is a DLL  */
00036 #    define  NITF_DLL_EXTENSION ".dll"
00037 #else
00038 /*
00039 *  BE WARY: Under Unix, we expect a DSO to have a .so extension,
00040 *  in addition to the NITF_PLUGIN_PATH.  That means that,
00041 *  despite a weak type extension system, your plugin won't
00042 *  get loaded without an .so extension.
00043 */
00044 #    define  NITF_DLL_EXTENSION ".so"
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 
00048 
00053 typedef struct _nitf_DLL
00054 {
00055     char *libname;    /* The name of the library */
00056     NITF_NATIVE_DLL lib;        /* A handle to the library */
00057 }
00058 nitf_DLL;
